title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 21, 2022
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 21, 2022 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [sudo (none9632) (⭐10)](https://github.com/none9632/zsh-sudo/) - Adds `sudo` as a prefix to the current command by typing `ESC`-`ESC`.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • sudo (none9632) (⭐10) - Adds sudo as a prefix to the current command by typing ESC-ESC.

items.title: Awesome Falsehood
items.content_text:
### Business

*   [Falsehoods about Online Shopping](https://wiesmann.codiferes.net/wordpress/archives/22201) - Covers prices, currencies and inventory.

### Geography

*   [Falsehoods about Geography](https://wiesmann.codiferes.net/wordpress/archives/15187) - Takes on places, their names and locations.

### Internationalization

*   [Falsehoods about Plain Text](https://jeremyhussell.blogspot.com/2017/11/falsehoods-programmers-believe-about.html#main) - Plain text can't cut it, which makes Unicode even more incredible for its ability to just work well.
*   [Falsehoods about text](https://wiesmann.codiferes.net/wordpress/archives/30296) - A subset of the falsehoods from above, illustrated with some examples.
items.content_html:
Business

  • Falsehoods about Online Shopping - Covers prices, currencies and inventory.

Geography

  • Falsehoods about Geography - Takes on places, their names and locations.

Internationalization

  • Falsehoods about Plain Text - Plain text can't cut it, which makes Unicode even more incredible for its ability to just work well.
  • Falsehoods about text - A subset of the falsehoods from above, illustrated with some examples.

items.title: Awesome Home Assistant
items.content_text:
### Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

*   [The Watchman (⭐545)](https://github.com/dummylabs/thewatchman) - Keep track of missing entities and services in your config files.
items.content_html:
Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

items.title: Awesome Dotnet
items.content_text:
### RPC / GUI - other

*   [gRPCurl (⭐12k)](https://github.com/fullstorydev/grpcurl) - gRPCurl is a command-line tool that lets you interact with gRPC servers. It's basically curl for gRPC servers.

### Serialization / GUI - other

*   [F# Data](https://fsprojects.github.io/FSharp.Data/) - F# type providers for accessing XML, JSON, CSV and HTML files (based on sample documents) and for accessing WorldBank data
items.content_html:
RPC / GUI - other

  • gRPCurl (⭐12k) - gRPCurl is a command-line tool that lets you interact with gRPC servers. It's basically curl for gRPC servers.

Serialization / GUI - other

  • F# Data - F# type providers for accessing XML, JSON, CSV and HTML files (based on sample documents) and for accessing WorldBank data

items.title: Awesome Newsletters
items.content_text:
### JavaScript / React

*   [This Week In React](https://thisweekinreact.com). Weekly newsletter for experienced React and React-Native developers.
*   [React Newsletter](https://reactnewsletter.com/). The free, weekly newsletter of the best React.js news and articles.
*   [React Native Newsletter](https://reactnativenewsletter.com/). Free occasional summary of React Native news, articles, issues & pull requests, libraries and apps.
*   [React Native Now](https://reactnativenow.com/). Hand picking the best React Native news, tutorials, libraries, articles, and videos.
items.content_html:
JavaScript / React

  • This Week In React. Weekly newsletter for experienced React and React-Native developers.
  • React Newsletter. The free, weekly newsletter of the best React.js news and articles.
  • React Native Newsletter. Free occasional summary of React Native news, articles, issues & pull requests, libraries and apps.
  • React Native Now. Hand picking the best React Native news, tutorials, libraries, articles, and videos.
